• download .glb
.txt : to load everything canvas file
.glb / .gltf : to replace the current draw object with another model
.png / .jpg : replace the draw object with an image plane
thumbnail : replace the draw object with the thumbnail model
  • Tested with chrome and safari mobile
  • Tablets and mobile supported
  • [LMB] to draw
  • [ALT + LMB] to rotate
  • [Scroll / ALT + CTRL + LMB] to zoom in/out
  • [CTRL + LMB] to pan up and down
  • [CTRL Z / CTRL Y] undo and redo stroke
  • [SHIFT] toggle stroke select
  • [SPACE] to toggle UI
  • Full docs here
  • Models from the Everything Library
  • Tool by Vince Mckelvie
  • Tested with chrome and safari mobile
  • Tablets and mobile supported
  • [PRESS] to draw
  • [PRESS + ] to rotate
  • [PINCH] to zoom in/out
  • [PESS + ] to pan up and down
  • [] to toggle ui
  • Full docs here
  • Models from the Everything Library
  • Tool by Vince Mckelvie

[w]

Draw Object ?
draw object opacity
view draw color
[ { ] [ } ] view draw distance
Essentials ?
[-][+] size
animation speed
smooth amount
[ ; ] [ ' ] reset - L normal offset
[ < ] [ > ] stroke denisty

scale random
position random
Mirror ?

additive rotation speed

rotate y
